review.reviewBody: Food was great. Loved the  Classic  pizza wish they had a large. One isn't enough.
The best brisket tacos ever, fantastic tuna poke, and great steam-burger
Vegan beet burger is decent, but why no side?! For a beyond burger at that price you'd think get a little salad or something. Might as well just head to A&W.
crust wasnt cooked. 3 pieces of pineapple.
Very annoying to just give a refund because you're out of something. A whole meal means someone is now not eating, and has to order from another restaurant---it would be normal to call, just sayin.
